title: Looking for higher tier player to teach me adc
body:
Hi, I'm looking for a higher tier adc roughly around plat/diamond or even challenger to help me get better at adc and guide me to know what it takes to win my lane from start to finish, Just looking to further my skills in the roll also to climb
I know you can't win every game of league you play their are bound to be loses 
Currently in b1

replies.body: Sure give me an add, im happy to give you a bit knowledge! ign: hi im bishop
